name: OM SEVA KENDRA

address: 3rd A Main Road, Syndicate Bank Colony, Herohalli Main Road, Vishwaneedam Post

briefDescription: We are an NGO doing Social Service since 2006. We are running a School for Intellectually Disabled & also provide them Free food, uniforms, Transportation.  Apart from these, we teach around 50 varieties of Drugless therapies, Yoga, Pranayama, Meditation, conduct various camps for eye, book, blood, cloth donations at various places
